sections.heading: Prima facie guilt of owner of brand to which another brand is altered3-1306
sections.text: Prima facie guilt of owner of brand to which another brand is alteredWhen it is proved that a recorded brand has been converted or changed into another brand claimed or owned by any person, it shall be prima facie evidence i
